title: You've been disconnected from chat, attempting to reconnect...

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

replies.body: Ive tried everything and i still have that problem...

The client connects you to a variety of different services, chat and pvp.net is one of them.  Something seems to be cutting you off from that, but the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help resolve this.
